TopicTitle: List of all the planet mods?

Articles.Content:
I was looking for a forum post or a wiki page with a list of \*all\* the mods that add planets, like Outer Planets or Kerbol Plus. Couldn't find one. 

If such a list does not yet exist or isn't kept up to date, I volunteer to maintain a list.

For a while \_Augustus\_ was maintaining a list in his [Kopernicus Core](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102363-Kopernicus-Core-Version-NAN-Outdated) page, but that's been removed. Here's my pile of bookmarks, feel free to copy and extend.

Random planets:

[Planet Randomizer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91363) (0.24)

[Kerbal Warp Drive! Procedural systems from a seed you choose!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97865) (0.25)

Planet Editing Tools:

[PlanetFactory CE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65401) (0.90?)

[Kopernicus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88168) (0.24)

[KopernicusTech - An integration attempt between Kopernicus and KittopiaTech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109122)

[Planitron Reloaded](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78857) (0.25)

[HyperEdit](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37756) (1.0)

[StarSystems](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99353) (0.90)

Planet packs:

[JoolPlus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82227) (??)

[Outer Planets Mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104280) (1.0.2)

[Sido's Urania System](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66882) (0.23)

[Working Multiple Star Systems(WITH PLANETS!)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103298) (0.90)

[Kerbol Minor Bodies](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107873) (0.90)

[Porp Gas Giant](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110710) (0.15)

[Forgotten Worlds for KopernicusTech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116068) (0.90)

[DunaPlus!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115174) (0.90)

[EvePlus!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115016) (0.90)

O hey, I found a wiki page!

[http://outer-planets.wikia.com/wiki/Planet_Packs](http://outer-planets.wikia.com/wiki/Planet_Packs)

I'm gonna check if it needs updating, thanks for your input hab136.
I'm interested too. I'd especially like an alternate star system rigged with all resources.

I was watching a YT vid on a mod that adds the planets back to KSP that a dev originally designed for the game.

*(and were later removed or never added???)*

I can't remember what the mod was called.

Can someone help?

and is it updated for 1.0.2?

> 
> I was watching a YT vid on a mod that adds the planets back to KSP that a dev originally designed for the game.
> *(and were later removed or never added???)*
> 
> I can't remember what the mod was called.
> 
> Can someone help?
> 
> and is it updated for 1.0.2?

I believe you are looking for KerbolPlus.

> 
> I believe you are looking for KerbolPlus.

**That's it!**

[**\[1.0.2\]\[Kopernicus\]KerbolPlus v.2.3.1 - a planet pack that ads the legendary Gas Planet 2 and more.**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118643-1-0-2-Kopernicus-KerbolPlus-v-2-0-5-a-planet-pack-that-ads-the-legendary-Gas-Planet-2-and-more)

*ThankYouVeryMuch!*
